reviewText:
Item was received as  Region 2  and so I cannot play these  DVD movies.  The sender would not accept return since I had opened the package to
find that  the DVD's were marked as Region 2.
The reality of the wrong country code was disappointing. Would not play on my US DVD player. The country code detail in the product description was lost on this ignorant US consumer. Caveat Emptor!
Great deal on these dvd's.  Worked fine on my all region dvd player. This was the best pricel I found on the net.
could not play dvd on my player as was not suitable for australia very disappointed and no return address on package to return it.
